评论概述: You get what you pay for
评论详情: The price seemed far too good to be true, but as a few reviews said it was soft and comfortable, and perhaps theirs was? I should have stuck with my instinct because I did not have that same experience. The shirt I received (gray, M) is very uncomfortable. It is ill-fitting, with woefully short arm and torso lengths. (Sizing up would not fix that, as the shirt is already a bit loose in me.) Anyone with longer arms or torso, or who likes their sleeves past their wrist bones, may not be in love with this one.  Even if the shirt had fit well, the fabric is also very coarse, stiff, and scratchy.  I'm not a fan.
